monitor.comment: Monitor index in mss: 1 = primary, 2 = secondary, etc.

debug.comment: show_window: shows a debug window with detections (great to check if the points are aligned), window_monitor_index: where to open the window (if there is a second monitor)

detection.comment: color_1 and color_2 are in RGB | scan_interval: time between scans in seconds | color_box: size of the box to sample color | color_tol: color tolerance for detection | color_min_count: minimum number of pixels within tolerance to consider a detection | color_min_sep: minimum separation between detected points | color_ratio_min and color_ratio_max: min and max ratio of color1 to color2 pixels to consider a detection

click.comment: delay: base in seconds, jitter: random +/- in seconds
